flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Whoa! I love the culture of this country. It's amazing. The people are so kind. The languages are so diverse.
guide.introduction_rendered: Whoa! I love the culture of this country. It's amazing. The people are so kind. The languages are so diverse.
guide.summary: The design of my own country. I want to persuade people to come to my country.
guide.title: World Cultures
